data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bernardi, Leopoldo Ferreira de Oliveira, Klompen, Hans, Zacarias, Mauricio Sergio, Ferreira, Rodrigo Lopes (2013): A new species of Neocarus Chamberlin & Mulaik, 1942 (Opilioacarida, Opilioacaridae) from Brazil, with remarks on its postlarval development. ZooKeys 358: 69-89, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.358.6384, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.358.6384
